param.name: projectid
param.description: id of the project to add the account to

param.name: account
param.description: name of the account to be added to the project

param.name: email
param.description: email to which invitation to the project is going to be sent

response.name: displaytext
response.description: any text associated with the success or failure

response.name: success
response.description: true if operation is executed successfully
